channel.title: Webhosting your server 24/7?
channel.description:
Does anyone know of a way where i could upload my server files to a site, (ex. freewebs), and have it run them 24/7? I don't mind if I'd have to create the character files for them, I'd kind of like to have a sign up... But if you know of a way could you please tell me?
[b]P.S. Hope this is right section, if it's not will a mod please fix it?[/b]

item.title: Webhosting your server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

The DNS server of the domain was their IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Webhosting your server 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

I’ve used a server that was connected to using a .com though, is that just the same thing basically as a no-ip then?

Read full topic
